Implement mandatory recycling: This rule would help to conserve valuable resources and reduce landfill waste. Recycling helps to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and protects our planet by reducing energy consumption and reducing the need to extract new resources.

Encourage people to take a one-week break from social media: Social media can be addictive and negatively impact mental health. This rule would encourage individuals to disconnect from social media and connect with the real world, which is essential for a productive and happy life.
Implement a carbon tax: This rule would create an economic incentive for individuals and companies to reduce their carbon footprint and mitigate the harmful effects of climate change.
Implement a two-week paid vacation for all employees: This rule would improve work-life balance, reduce stress, and increase job satisfaction and productivity among workers worldwide.

Implement a universal basic income: This rule would provide a basic level of financial support to all citizens, ensuring that no one in the world lives in poverty. It would reduce income inequality, promote social mobility, and provide a safety net for those who are unable to work.
